email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you consider coming down to $49.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the rate down to $50.00 per metric ton, but $49.75 is a stretch. As for demurrage, it’s set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. We can agree to $50.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, we can confirm the laycan as 15-20 October. However, the demurrage rate is non-negotiable at $25,000 per day. I hope this works for you. If so, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, understood on the demurrage. We’ll proceed with the terms as discussed: $50.00 per metric ton, laycan 15-20 October, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll have the charter party agreement drafted and sent to you by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
